name: Rocket Chat Flash Briefing
description: Anywhere anytime Alexa flash briefing publishing - powered by Rocket.Chat

SERVER_URL.description: Enter Your Rocket Chat Server URL. Ex- https://your.server.chat

CACHE_TTL.description: Data Update Frequency In Seconds. For example: If you want your data to be updated every 5 Minutes, enter 3600

TITLE_TEXT.description: The title of the feed item to display in the Alexa app.
